description:
Shimano XT quality replacement disc rotor.

  • ICE Technologies™ Freeza uses the same sandwich of aluminum and steel layers as standard Ice Tech, but now extends the middle aluminum layer towards the center of the rotor, more surface area equals better heat management. All of that technology means brake fade is a thing of the past
  • Compatible with wheels that uses the Shimano Center Lock standard
  • Compatible with resin and metal pads
name: Shimano XT RT-MT800 Centre Lock Disc Brake Rotor
